metadata.title: Coastal Oceanographic Data

creators.name: Development Institute (NFRDI), Korea Oceanographic Data Centre (KODC)

metadata.description: Daily observations at 10:00 A.M were carried out for surface temperature, air temperature and other meteorological factors at 40 fixed stations (at lighthouse) in Korean coastal waters. The observation starting years are different along to the stations. Recently, there are some stations in which the observation were stopped by the change over the self-operating lighthouse.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To archive daily coastal oceanographic observations.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Daily

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Contact Source.
